name: Adventurer Quest
description:
An action game, you can play as 3 different characters.

Slofin, Knight and Bard.

You kill, you spend money, you level up. 

You kill more monsters, you earn more money. 

You kill the boss, you win. 

Arrow key: Move 

Spacebar: Attack, Confirm, PET DOG (IMPORTANT!!!)

play download version for better performance.
